SEARCH
Package com.group7.krisefikser.controller

Class EmergencyGroupController

java.lang.Object
com.group7.krisefikser.controller.EmergencyGroupController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/emergency-groups") public class EmergencyGroupController extends Object
Controller class for handling HTTP requests related to emergency groups. This class contains endpoints for retrieving and adding emergency groups. It uses the EmergencyGroupService to perform the operations.

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getEmergencyGroupById(@PathVariable Long id)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the EmergencyGroupResponse object with the specified ID

    • addEmergencyGroup

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> addEmergencyGroup(@RequestBody EmergencyGroupRequest request)
      Adds a new EmergencyGroup to the repository.
      Parameters:
      request - the EmergencyGroup object to add
      Returns:
      the EmergencyGroupResponse object representing the added group

    • inviteHouseholdByName

      @PostMapping("/invite/{householdName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> inviteHouseholdByName(@PathVariable String householdName)
      Invites a household to an emergency group by its name.
      Parameters:
      householdName - the name of the household to invite.
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation

    • answerInvitation

      @PatchMapping("/answer-invitation/{groupId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> answerInvitation(@PathVariable Long groupId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid InvitationReplyRequest request, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      Answers the invitation to an emergency group. This method allows a user to accept or decline an invitation to join an emergency group.
      Parameters:
      groupId - the ID of the group to answer the invitation for
      request - the request object containing the user's response
      bindingResult - the binding result for validation errors
      Returns:
      a response entity indicating the result of the operation

    • getInvitations

      @GetMapping("/invitations") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> getInvitations()
      Retrieves the list of invitations for the current user's household.
      Returns:
      a response entity containing the list of invitations
